title: McLaren launches AI tool that reviews CT scans for heart attack risk
description: McLaren Health Care is using an artificial intelligence tool to review Michiganders' medical charts and imaging tests to spot signs of heart disease.
content:
Grand Blanc-based McLaren Health Care announced it has launched an artificial intelligence tool to spot early signs of heart disease in patients' CT scans.

title: AI Is Already Taking Jobs From Young US Workers, Fed's Michael Barr Warns
description: Artificial intelligence may already be displacing some of America's youngest workers, according to Federal Reserve Governor Michael S. Barr.
content:
Artificial intelligence may already be displacing some of America's youngest workers, according to Fed Governor Michael Barr.

title: The value investor shuns AI
description: Einhorn's latest moves reflect his views on artificial intelligence and the market as a whole.
content: Greenlight Capital's David Einhorn has been vocal about his concerns around artificial intelligence driving overvaluation in the stock market. His fund's latest moves reflect those views. Einhorn spent tens of millions of dollars buying shares of Gra... [4428 chars]

title: India must build sovereign infra for artificial intelligence: Experts
description: Panellists assert small number of economies pulling ahead in access to advanced chips, reliable power and high-assurance data centre capacity.

title: AI Summit sparks diplomatic blitz as Modi sharpens tech, trade push with foreign leaders
description: The high-level engagements with seven world leaders on the sidelines of the AI Impact Summit-2026 centred on artificial intelligence, emerging technologies, energy security and the proposed India-European Union Free Trade Agreement.

title: AI Impact Summit turns political flashpoint as Congress targets Centre over ‘Chinese robot’ row
description: According to the Congress, the handling of the summit had made India “a laughing stock” in the field of artificial intelligence, an area where the country could emerge as a global leader.
content: The Congress on Wednesday accused the BJP-led Centre of turning the ongoing India AI Impact Summit into a “disorganised PR spectacle”. The party alleged that Chinese products were being showcased while India’s own talent and data potential were ignor... [3007 chars]

title: Proposed Almaguin data centre touts jobs and investment, but council urges caution
description: A proposed artificial intelligence data centre in Armour Township is being billed as a major investment and a source of high-paying tech jobs, but councillors are holding off on support while they study potential noise and land-use impacts
content:
A proposed artificial intelligence (AI) data centre could bring high-tech infrastructure and high-paying jobs to Almaguin, but elected officials are pausing to study noise and other impacts before saying yes.

description: Prime Minister of the Netherlands Dick Schoof hailed the AI Impact Summit 2026, noting an artificial intelligence boom in India.
content:
